name: authportal
description: Auth Portal is a customizable authentication portal for Kubernetes clusters and reverse proxies, allowing self-registration, password resets, and user management via UI or API.
features: Authentication Portal: Customizable auth gateway for Kubernetes and proxies. Flexible access control.
Self-Registration: Allow users to create their own accounts. Reduced admin overhead.
Password Management: Users can reset passwords independently. Self-service security.
User Management: Admin interface for account administration. Centralized control.
Kubernetes Integration: Native support for K8s clusters. Cloud-native.
Reverse Proxy: Works with popular proxy solutions. Easy integration.
API Access: Manage users programmatically. Automation-ready.
Customizable: Adapt portal to your branding and needs. Tailored experience.
